channel.title: AIX on DevOps Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in AIX on DevOps Engineer

item.title: Problems and solutions when upgrading XLC from 10.1 to IBM Open XL C/C++ for AIX 17.1.0
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article documents the problems encountered when upgrading from IBM XLC 10.1 to XLC 17.1 (IBM Open XL C/C++ for AIX 17.1.0) and how to fix the errors.

item.title: Solving Two Git Clone Failure Issues on AIX
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article documents two issues encountered when using Jenkins for Git clone on AIX and their solutions, including dependent library loading failure and SSH authentication failure.

item.title: Resolving Git Large Repository Download Failures on AIX by Removing File Resource Limits
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: Resolving Git large repository download failures on AIX due to file size limits by modifying ulimit settings.
